Лагучая помойка, которая вывозит только на том, что в этой области нет конкурентов.
Из плюсов(их тут не много):
1) Достаточно интересные маньяки. Безусловно, некоторые маньяки платные и их нужно покупать только за реальную валюту, но тебе дается несколько маньяков в самом начале игры, а также впоследствии поднимая уровень ты можешь брать еще маньяков(за игровую бесплатную валюту)
2) Проработанная система способностей. Для каждого выжившего/ маньяка здесь есть три ИНДИВИДУАЛЬНЫЕ способности(которые вы, конечно, можете перекинуть на других персонажей если прокачаетесь) а также уйма интересных способностей(спойлер, всегда вы будете использовать только полюбившиеся вам 4)
На этом плюсы заканчиваются
Минусы:
1) Баланс. Баланса в этой игре ВООБЩЕ НЕТ. Если у тебя есть имбовые перки, которые ты постоянно используешь, то при игре хоть за маньяка, хоть за выжившего ты априори победил, т.к некоторым из них просто нечего противопоставить, а если их еще и использует грамотный ман, то можно сразу ливать. С маньяками та же проблема, есть те, которые вообще бесполезны(или же КРАЙНЕ ситуативны), а есть и те, которые достаточно сильные.
2) Комьюнити. Комьюнити в дбд чрезвычайно токсичное, я не один раз это замечал, вас здесь засрут за ВСЁ. Чинишь генераторы-дурачок, не чинишь генераторы-дурачок, снял своего с крюка-дурачок, не снял своего с крюка-дурачок, кто так подставляет, сбежал без чела, хотя у него уже не было шансов-паскуда, гнида и мразота. Это всё и многое другое вы услышите здесь, также если вы играете за мана.
3) Это наверное самая основная проблема, которую я описывал до этого, но сейчас распишу снова. Это проблема с серверами, вот например вчера мы с друзьями планировали поиграть, в конечном итоге сервера нас просто послали, мы около часа пытались запустить, но постоянно вылезала ошибка. Даже если вы наиграете сотни часов, станете спокойным и не будете бомбить, это вас точно взбесит.
Игре поставлю 6/10, потому что удовольствие она мне всё-же доставляла, ну и она единственная в таком жанре, но если вдруг появится её достойный и хороший аналог, возможно, я перейду в этот аналог.
Веселая выживалка с маньяком ыЫЫЫ

I love this game but the disconnection penalties are insane. There's NO POINT giving someone beyond 24 hours of penalty because there are so many possibilities of disconnections happening. In my case I don't get wifi disconnections but I do always have GPU crashes in the middle of rounds but it also depends on the game updates and how DBD tends to sometimes change the game's graphics quality. Like it could be fine in a current update, but the next update i might have GPU crash come back again. I usually averagely play 10-15 rounds in a day and I crash 1 time and would receive a loooong penalty. But anyway the crazy disconnection penalties is what infuriates me about this game. I've always hit 48 hrs of penalty then I'd have to wait 5-6 DAYS just to be safe (for the penalty duration to be over AND the duration for the levels to go down) to get back to playing this game which is wasting A LOT of my time.

This is a good game but the community completely ruins it, its one of the most toxic game community's I have ever seen by far so much so that they very fun gameplay cant make up for it. i'd say personally this is a game to play with your friends if they are mature enough which most people who play this game are not shown by the childish behaviour of the community. on Instagram the developers give out free codes every once in a while and if its anything less than 100K blood points this entitled community will; complain about free things.

However the community is not the only issues in this game the biggest one is the in game purchases of auric cells which can not be earned any other way than with money there are iridescent shards however which can be earned but some purchases in the in game shop. normally i wouldn't be very upset about this but there are two factors which make this infuriating.
1. some killers are locked behind pay walls and before recent updates their perks were too
2. this is a game you have to purchase as most of the time it isn't free (i had to buy it full price)
this could be ignored by most players but i really liked this game at one point and i spent lots of money on it and now i feel as though i am forced to continue playing and buying things. if given the chance i would refund every cent i have spent on this game i would take it immediately. In conclusion don't buy this game as playing it will only leech your happiness and cause stress, so unless you are able to put up with the toxic community DON'T BUY THE GAME.

運営がひどいゲームです。１対４でキラーは立ち回らなければいけないのに、運営はサバイバーばかりを優遇、キラーはナーフされてばかり。ゲーム性はとても面白く、唯一無二なんですが、いかんせん運営がひどい。私はドMですが、さすがにそろそろ離れるかもしれません。次の恵みアップデートがこのままの状態で来るのであれば、キラーはかなり減るでしょうね。

ERA divertido, ahora no lo recomiendo en lo absoluto, desbalanceado, los desarrolladores no conocen su propio juego, hacen a los supervivientes más y más rotos, como killer es muy molesto jugar, porque todo el tiempo te tiran supervivientes que te hacen genrush, que si no tiras en menos de 2 minutos los generadores vuelan, es ridiculamente aburrido, miserable jugar esta basura, ya no lo vale, como superviviente jugar tambien es aburrido, porque tu equipo es todo el rato lo mismo, llaves, linternas, mapas rotos, asqueroso, me arrepiento mucho de haberle gastado dinero a esto.
LOVE IT! especially when playing with friends :D

I've been addicted to DBD now for 6 months and I highly recommend this game for the jumps and thrills of being hunted by your favorite killers, working with others to complete generators and rescuing other survivors!

This game captures the horror entertainment experience better than any movie or game I've ever played.  If you enjoy "horror," or "experience," or "than," you absolutely must play this game.

The asymmetric format allows you to play with friends (as a survivor) or solo (as a killer), and to main one style while merely dabbling in the other.  Playing the killer is perfect for a loser like me, who finds nothing more relaxing than tossing people up on giant hooks and sending their souls straight to party town since no one will talk to me in real life.

Assim como todos os jogos, existem os problemas e as qualidades. Dead by Daylight é um jogo bastante dinâmico, cheio de objetivos e funções. Os killers são divertidos, e mais divertido ainda quando eles são balanceados. O balanceamento, tanto dentro, quanto em relação ao emparelhamento é relativamente complicado. Eu vejo que o maior problema do jogo, são as pessoas, e não necessariamente o jogo. Recomendo muito o jogo e acredito que se o desenvolvedor do jogo dar mais e mais atenção ao jogo, vai se tornar um jogo muito mais agradável, rentável e divertido.

I was afraid this game would make me feel like a bad person to play. But it is really fun. Sometimes you get a nice killer or a really adept killer who can remember how many times a person was hooked while downing and allowing the rez but putting pressure on gens at the same time - and then everyone gets a LOT of BP. It's great that way! The killers who are able to be sneaky and pop out and freak you out (SHAPE, GHOST FACE, PIG HEAD) are so fun to play against when they are adept killers who really get joy from the game. The killers really make the game - and if you get a skilled killer who makes the game scary and fun - it's awesome!! There are many times where you just get a killer who stand and stares at a hooked survivor and then it is both boring and toxic.
